definition: sense of movement (often in a static work of art)/dynamic/vivid/lifelike
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~

sentences.english: Weddings and funerals are the emotional events.
sentences.chinese: 婚事和丧事都是动感情的时候。

sentences.english: One of the game's big selling points is its action-oriented movement.
sentences.chinese: 这款游戏的最大的卖点在于动感十足。

sentences.english: A method of making true color moving holograms with one-wavelength laser is proposed in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用单色激光器制作真彩色动感全息图的方法。

sentences.english: He thinks of becoming Action Kamen in order to attract people's attention.
sentences.chinese: 或者，可以考虑扮个动感超人引起大家注意。

sentences.english: However, the most emotional part of the evening was devoted to health care.
sentences.chinese: 不过当晚最使人动感情的演讲都是关于医疗保健的。

sentences.english: But long time's spinning can damage hearing.
sentences.chinese: 但是长时间骑动感单车会损伤听力。

sentences.english: The HGTE package is designed to deliver even sportier , more dynamic driving.
sentences.chinese: 的HGTE套件是设计来提供更动感，更有力推动。

sentences.english: After the time of exercise lesson, please do not go to the sensible bicycle room.
sentences.chinese: 课程以外时间段，请勿进入动感单车室。

sentences.english: Women nare often said to be more emotional than men.
sentences.chinese: 女人常常被认为比男人更易动感情。

sentences.english: In the beginning, she put Faith on a surfing board to let him feel the movements.
sentences.chinese: 一开始，她让Faith在一块滑浪板上感受动感。

sentences.english: My wife's an old softy who cries at sad movies.
sentences.chinese: 我妻子是个看伤感电影就哭的极易动感情的人。

sentences.english: The dynamic smooth line design illustrates the intellectual crystallization tinged with liveliness.
sentences.chinese: 动感流畅的线条设计，睿智中略带活泼情怀。

sentences.english: Dynamic VFD display screen enables to control temperature at your options.
sentences.chinese: 动感VFD显示屏，随心调控生活每一度。

sentences.english: This kind of fashionaBle toy for children is quite welcome to them Because of its activity and energy.
sentences.chinese: 这种新颖儿童玩具，动感好，活力强，很受儿童欢迎。

sentences.english: Cycling and spinning are also effective cross-training options.
sentences.chinese: 骑脚踏车或是动感单车同样是交叉训练的有效选择。

sentences.english: When an arguer argues dispassionately he thinks only of the argument.
sentences.chinese: 当一个辩论者不动感情于争辩，他只是为争辩而辩。

definition: line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
